translation.en: [man]All right, settle down, settle down. Yes, I know. They're both great books.
translation.zh: 好了 都安静下来 是的 我知道 这两本书都很精彩

translation.en: So, my question is:
translation.zh: 所以 我要问的是

translation.en: which one do you like better?
translation.zh: 你们更喜欢哪一本？

translation.en: Catcher in the Rye, for sure.
translation.zh: 当然是《麦田守望者》

translation.en: Holden Caulfield's a pimp.
translation.zh: 霍尔顿考尔菲德是个拉皮条的

translation.en: -[class snickering] -[man] No.
translation.zh: 才不是

translation.en: Iceberg Slim is a pimp.
translation.zh: “瘦冰山”罗伯特贝克才是拉皮条的

translation.en: Holden Caulfield is a spoiled rich kid from the Upper East Side
translation.zh:
霍尔顿考尔菲德是个来自上东区
有钱人家的 被宠坏的小孩

translation.en: who goes to a fancy prep school.
translation.zh: 上的是高级私立预科学校

translation.en: Sound familiar?
translation.zh: 听起来很耳熟吧？

translation.en: Uh, what about you, Mr. Anderson?
translation.zh: 那你呢 安德森先生？

translation.en: Well, my dad's not a billionaire Wall Street CEO,
translation.zh:
我老爸可不是身家上亿
在华尔街工作的首席执行官

translation.en: and if he is, he owes my mom a whole lot of back child support.
translation.zh:
如果他是的话
那他可欠了我妈妈一大笔抚养费

translation.en: -[laughing] -So I'm partial to Lord of the Flies.
translation.zh: 我比较喜欢《蝇王》

translation.en: I don't think Holden Caulfield would last a week on this island.
translation.zh:
我觉得在《蝇王》里的这个岛上
霍尔顿考尔菲德一周也撑不下去

translation.en: He'd be running around like a little punk, wishing for this nightmare to be over.
translation.zh:
他会像个小废物那样四处乱窜
心中企盼这个噩梦能够结束

translation.en: -[laughing] -Kind of like a substitute teacher.
translation.zh: 有点像我们对代课老师的感觉

translation.en: Well played, Max.
translation.zh: 说得好 马克斯

translation.en: You know, the good news is
translation.zh: 你知道吗 好消息是

translation.en: you have a very bright academic future ahead of you.
translation.zh: 你的求学前景一片光明

translation.en: The bad news is,
translation.zh: 坏消息是

translation.en: you're probably gonna be a virgin till you're 35 years old.
translation.zh: 你大概要等到35岁才能破处

translation.en: All right, class, that's a wrap.
translation.zh: 好了 同学们 下课了

translation.en: Anderson, out.
translation.zh: 安德森 退场

translation.en: [girl] Bye, Mr. Anderson.
translation.zh: 再见 安德森先生

translation.en: Bye, sweetheart, take it easy. Later, man.
translation.zh: 再见 甜心 拜拜 老兄 回头见

translation.en: Saved by the bell, huh?
translation.zh: 被下课铃拯救了 嗯？

translation.en: Principal Mellon, hey.
translation.zh: 嘿 梅隆校长

translation.en: You definitely have a way with the students, Rob.
translation.zh: 你挺擅长和学生相处啊 罗伯

translation.en: Kids, for some reason, I connect with them.
translation.zh:
出于某种原因
我和孩子们打成一片

translation.en: It's probably our love of Rihanna and the occasional acne flare-up.
translation.zh:
大概是因为我们都喜欢蕾哈娜
还都偶尔会长长青春痘

translation.en: Listen, Ms. James' stint in rehab is gonna go a bit longer than expected...
translation.zh:
听着 詹姆斯女士的戒毒康复治疗期
比我们预计得要长一点…

translation.en: Okay, yeah, well, crack'll do that to you.
translation.zh: 好吧 霹雳的确不是那么好戒的

translation.en: I've got a full-time position. Love to talk to about it--
translation.zh: 我这里有份全职工作 想跟你谈谈…

translation.en: Let me stop you right there.
translation.zh: 请恕我打断你的话

translation.en: I'm good for a couple days a week,
translation.zh: 我可以每周过来工作几天

translation.en: but I can't commit to anything more than that.
translation.zh: 但是我不能承担比这更多的工作了

translation.en: Now if you'll excuse me, I'm getting married tomorrow.
translation.zh: 恕我先走一步 我明天就要结婚了

translation.en: I have an Uber waiting outside,
translation.zh: 外面有辆优步车在等我

translation.en: and I don't want to mess up my five-star rating.
translation.zh: 而我不想失去我的五星信用好评

translation.en: -Think about it. -Thank you.
translation.zh:
-考虑一下
-谢谢

translation.en: -[elevator bell dings] -Baby, it's me.
translation.zh:
宝贝 是我
不知道你收没收到我的短信

translation.en: I don't know if you got my messages. I'm in the terminal.
translation.zh:
宝贝 是我
不知道你收没收到我的短信 但我现在在航站楼 明白吗？
我们待会见

translation.en: -I'll see you soon. Whoa! -Hey!
translation.zh: 嗨！

translation.en: [grunts] Oh! Excuse me.
translation.zh: 抱歉让一让

translation.en: God!
translation.zh: 天呐！

translation.en: Excuse me. Whoo!
translation.zh: 借过一下

translation.en: Hey. Hi. Rob Anderson.
translation.zh: 嘿 嗨 我是罗伯安德森

translation.en: I'm on Flight 1492 to Charleston.
translation.zh: 我坐的是1492号航班 去查尔斯顿的

translation.en: Oh, oh, I'm sorry, sir. The doors to that flight are closed.
translation.zh:
抱歉 先生
该航班的登机门已经关闭了

translation.en: Well, can't you open them?
translation.zh: 你们不能再打开吗？

translation.en: I mean, it's doors, that's what they do. They open and close. [laughs]
translation.zh:
我是说 登机门也是门
门就是用来开和关的啊

translation.en: Ah! I can get you on a flight for tomorrow.
translation.zh: 我可以帮你预订明天的航班

translation.en: No, no, no, I can't go tomorrow. I need to be there today.
translation.zh:
不行 我不能等到明天再走
我必须今天赶到查尔斯顿

translation.en: I get married tomorrow.
translation.zh: 我明天就要结婚了

translation.en: I am sorry, sir. Our last flight out today is completely booked.
translation.zh:
抱歉 我们今天最晚一趟
去查尔斯顿的航班已满座

translation.en: -No. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 不要啊

translation.en: Attention!
translation.zh: 大家注意！

translation.en: Attention, ladies and gentlemen.
translation.zh: 女士们 先生们 请注意

translation.en: My name is Rob Anderson.
translation.zh: 我叫罗伯安德森

translation.en: I'm willing to do unspeakably desperate and nasty things
translation.zh:
我愿意不惜一切代价
做任何无法描述的事

translation.en: for a plane ticket on the next flight to Charleston.
translation.zh:
来换取一张下趟飞往
查尔斯顿的航班的机票

translation.en: Anybody?
translation.zh: 有人愿意换吗？

translation.en: [woman] How desperate?
translation.zh: 你愿意付出多少代价？

translation.en: Um... Anything short of a felony.
translation.zh: 除了犯罪以外的一切

translation.en: Well, do you have cash?
translation.zh: 你有现金吗？

translation.en: No, but I do have this first-generation iPhone.
translation.zh: 没有 但我有这个第一代苹果手机

translation.en: Well, you're not exactly dazzling me with options here.
translation.zh:
看来你其实没有什么
能让我眼前一亮的

translation.en: I have been known to be a pretty tender lover.
translation.zh: 我一直是公认的超体贴情人

translation.en: Ooh. Well, I'm gonna need a sample of your work.
translation.zh: 那我需要你给我做个示范

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: -Hi, beautiful. -Hi.
translation.zh:
-嗨 美人儿
-嗨

translation.en: -How was that? -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 感觉怎么样？

translation.en: I got your messages. We're on the next flight out.
translation.zh:
我收到了你的信息
我们坐下趟航班走

translation.en: -Yes! See, that's why I'm marrying you. -You are lucky you just got here.
translation.zh:
-太棒了！这就是我娶你的原因
-你刚赶到这里是你走运

translation.en: You know, I was really mad about two glasses of wine ago.
translation.zh:
在我喝掉两杯红酒之前
我真的非常生气

translation.en: I have a very good excuse. See, I was securing our financial future.
translation.zh:
我有充足的理由
看 我是在为我们的未来挣钱

translation.en: [groans] You're late because you were playing the lotto.
translation.zh: 你迟到是因为你在玩乐透

translation.en: Baby, you got to be in it to win it.
translation.zh: 宝贝 你得投入才能赢

translation.en: Hey, I got you something.
translation.zh: 嘿 我有礼物给你

translation.en: You know, at one point,
translation.zh: 你知道 你曾一度

translation.en: you described that as a rainbow exploding in your mouth.
translation.zh:
把它形容成一条
在你嘴里开花的彩虹

translation.en: Now, there's a lot of different ways I can go with that,
translation.zh:
现在我能用很多
与之相配的不同言辞来形容它

translation.en: but I'm just gonna stick to, "They're yummy."
translation.zh:
但我还是坚持“它很好吃”
这个说法吧

translation.en: -Thank you. -You're welcome.
translation.zh:
-谢谢
-不客气

translation.en: Right now, I'm just happy you're here. I had a really tough day.
translation.zh:
现在我只是很开心你在我身边
我今天实在是过得很累

translation.en: Oh, what happened? Did your daddy buy some mom-and-pop company
translation.zh:
怎么？你爸爸又收购了某家私人公司
然后必须开除其所有员工

translation.en: and has to fire everybody so he ain't gonna make the wedding?
translation.zh:
怎么？你爸爸又收购了某家私人公司
然后必须开除其所有员工 所以不能来参加婚礼了？

translation.en: -You wish. -I do!
translation.zh:
-想得美
-我的确希望这是真的！

translation.en: No, I had to tell a six-year-old
translation.zh: 不是 是我要告诉一个六岁的小女孩

translation.en: that she has a tumor in her stomach and needs surgery.
translation.zh: 胃里长了个肿瘤 需要开刀做手术

translation.en: -Oh, babe, that's terrible. -But she's gonna beat it for sure.
translation.zh:
-宝贝 这太糟糕了
-但她肯定会挺过来的

translation.en: Yeah, she's gonna beat it. You know why?
translation.zh:
没错 她会挺过来的
知道为什么吗？

translation.en: 'Cause she's got the best doctor in New York City.
translation.zh:
因为她的主治医生是
全纽约市最棒的

translation.en: Oh, scratch that. She's got the best doctor in the galaxy.
translation.zh:
这句话收回 应该是
她的主治医生是全银河系最棒的

translation.en: Assuming there are space doctors out there on some undiscovered planet.
translation.zh:
如果某个人类未发现的星球上
真有外星人医生的话

translation.en: Stop it. Wait, how was school?
translation.zh: 行了 等等 学校那边怎么样？

translation.en: -It was good. -Yeah?
translation.zh:
-很好
-是吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I didn't save nobody's life, but Mellon offered me a full-time gig.
translation.zh:
是啊 我没有救死扶伤
但梅隆想请我做全职教师

translation.en: -Really? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-真的？
-是的

translation.en: That's great, baby!
translation.zh: 这太棒了 宝贝！

translation.en: You are an amazing teacher.
translation.zh: 你是个很了不起的老师

translation.en: Thank you. What took us so long to do this?
translation.zh:
谢谢 是什么让我们
等了这么长时间才结婚？

translation.en: Uh, probably because it took you seven years to ask.
translation.zh: 大概是因为你等了七年才决定求婚

translation.en: You know, a part of me thought you'd never propose.
translation.zh:
知道吗？以前我隐约觉得
你永远不会向我求婚

translation.en: Well, it's like my favorite Justin Bieber song.
translation.zh:
这就像我最喜欢的
那首贾斯丁比伯的歌

translation.en: -"Never Say Never." -Oh, yeah.
translation.zh:
-《永不言败》
-没错

translation.en: Or my second favorite Justin Bieber song...
translation.zh:
或是用我第二喜欢的
那首贾斯丁比伯的歌来形容…

translation.en: -"Sorry." -That was a good one.
translation.zh:
-《对不起》
-这个说法还不错

translation.en: -Would you look at the flowers! -Yeah, it's nice.
translation.zh:
-看看那些花！
-是啊 很漂亮

translation.en: Oh, look at that one. It's beautiful.
translation.zh: 瞧瞧那个 真美

translation.en: -Hey, my man! -What's up?
translation.zh:
-嘿 我的兄弟！
-你好吗？

translation.en: -Excuse me for one second. -Oh, hi.
translation.zh:
-我先失陪一会儿
-你好！

translation.en: -What's up, man? -What's up, buddy?
translation.zh:
-你好吗 兄弟？
-你好吗 伙计？

translation.en: Hey, real quick,
translation.zh: 嘿 我就多问一句

translation.en: did you know your mother sang back up for The Gap Band on the Humpin' Tour?
translation.zh:
你知道你妈妈曾今
为裂缝乐队伴唱吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I think she missed my birthday that year.
translation.zh:
是的 我想她那年就是因为这个
没来给我庆生

translation.en: -First of many. -Robbie, baby! [chuckles]
translation.zh:
-好几次了 那只是第一次
-罗比 宝贝！

translation.en: -Hey, Mama. -Listen.
translation.zh:
-妈妈
-听着

translation.en: I was just about to tell Benjamin
translation.zh: 我正要跟本杰明说

translation.en: about the time I was singing with Rick James in 1984.
translation.zh:
1984年我和瑞克詹姆斯
一起演唱的事

translation.en: It was a lot of cigarettes, Johnnie Walker Black,
translation.zh: 我们抽了很多烟 喝了黑方

translation.en: and it involved a basement!
translation.zh: 还在地下室做了些事！

translation.en: There's my beautiful baby girl.
translation.zh: 我漂亮的宝贝女儿来了

translation.en: -Daddy, hi! -Hi, baby. Oh.
translation.zh:
-爸爸 嗨！
-嗨 宝贝

translation.en: -Wow, you made it. -Yes!
translation.zh:
-哇哦 你赶过来了
-是的！

translation.en: -How are you, sir? Good-- -You're late.
translation.zh:
-你好吗 先生？晚上好…
-你迟到了

translation.en: Yeah, we had a rough start. But I think the worst part is behind us.
translation.zh:
是的 我们刚出发的时候不太顺
但我想最困难的部分已经过去了

translation.en: What Rob didn't tell you is that he got a job offer today.
translation.zh:
罗伯没告诉你的是
他今天得到了一份工作邀请

translation.en: -Really? -Larkin Prep wants him to teach full-time.
translation.zh:
-真的吗？
-拉金私立预科学校想让他做全职

translation.en: Oh, now, that's nice.
translation.zh: 哦 不错啊

translation.en: You're getting married, working for the man,
translation.zh: 你要结婚了 有份好工作

translation.en: like a productive member of society.
translation.zh: 就像一个对社会有贡献的人

translation.en: Yeah, but I didn't say I was gonna accept.
translation.zh: 是啊 但我没说我会接受这份邀请

translation.en: You know, the hours, from eight to three,
translation.zh: 你懂得 从早上八点工作到下午三点

translation.en: and then you have to stay behind and grade papers.
translation.zh: 然后还得加班改卷子

translation.en: Sounds like backbreaking work.
translation.zh: 听起来是份很累人的工作

translation.en: Rob is just so amazing with those kids. They love him.
translation.zh:
罗伯很擅长和孩子们相处
他们都很喜欢他

translation.en: I mean, he is going to make a great father.
translation.zh: 我是说 他会成为一个优秀的父亲

translation.en: [laughs] And I cannot wait for the grandbabies.
translation.zh:
我都等不及要看到
我的孙子孙女出生了

translation.en: Maybe we'll just wait a while for the kids.
translation.zh: 也许我们会晚点要孩子

translation.en: We'll just enjoy marriage, right?
translation.zh: 我们会先享受下二人世界 不是吗？

translation.en: You ordered the wrong font for the programs.
translation.zh: 你订的婚礼安排手册 字体是错的

translation.en: I expect you to pick up the new ones first thing tomorrow.
translation.zh:
我希望你明天第一件事
就是去取新手册

translation.en: Okay. It's not like I have anything important to do, right?
translation.zh:
好吧 看起来明天我也没什么
重要的事可做 不是吗？

translation.en: And, Rob, this is your wedding rehearsal. You could at least wear a jacket.
translation.zh:
罗伯 这是你的婚礼彩排
你至少要穿件西装夹克来吧

translation.en: -It is a jacket. -It's a sweater.
translation.zh:
-这是件夹克
-这是件运动衫

translation.en: Well, it's kind of like a jacketed sweater.
translation.zh: 这是有点像夹克的运动衫

translation.en: It's a "swacket."
translation.zh: 叫“夹克衫”

translation.en: A swacket.
translation.zh: 夹克衫

translation.en: Dad, uh, where is Vicky?
translation.zh: 爸爸 维姬呢？

translation.en: Oh, she's checking you guys in because Rob was so late.
translation.zh:
她去酒店给你们办入住手续了
因为罗伯迟到太久了

translation.en: We're all just trying to make this the perfect wedding for you.
translation.zh:
我们都想要为你们
打造一个完美的婚礼

translation.en: If only your mother were here.
translation.zh: 真希望你母亲在这里

translation.en: Dad, I know, but she is here. She's here.
translation.zh:
爸爸 我懂 但她在这里
她就在这里

translation.en: Oh, I have to take this.
translation.zh: 这个电话我必须接

translation.en: An investor group is planning a hostile takeover of my company,
translation.zh:
一个投资集团正在计划
恶意收购我的公司

translation.en: on this of all weekends.
translation.zh: 就在这个周末

translation.en: You kids start without me. Hello?
translation.zh: 你们开始吧 不用等我 喂？

translation.en: What do you got? You're kidding me!
translation.zh: 有什么消息？你没在开玩笑吧！

translation.en: Is he really gonna miss the rehearsal?
translation.zh: 他真打算缺席这个婚礼彩排？

translation.en: It's okay. I am the daughter of Reginald Swope.
translation.zh: 没事的 我是雷金纳德斯沃普的女儿

translation.en: -I'm used to it. Hi! -Hi.
translation.zh:
-我已经习惯了 嗨！
-嗨

translation.en: All right, loving family, let's rehearse.
translation.zh:
好了 相亲相爱的一家人
我们开始彩排吧

translation.en: -[Rob] Thank God we are here. -[Ben] Yes.
translation.zh:
-总算是到了
-是啊

translation.en: Did I ever tell you that I love you, but I hate your driving?
translation.zh:
我有没有告诉过你
我爱你 但我恨你的驾驶技术？

translation.en: -Why, 'cause I know how to drive? -You're terrible.
translation.zh:
-为啥 因为我会开车？
-你开车技术很烂

translation.en: Yeah, whatever. I'm terrible.
translation.zh: 随你怎么说 我开车技术很烂

translation.en: Did you hear Megan's dad going on and on about the programs?
translation.zh:
你有没有听到梅根的老爸不停地
叨叨婚礼安排手册的事？

translation.en: Yes, and you need to tighten up, man,
translation.zh: 是啊 你要认真起来 老兄

translation.en: because it's my responsibility to make sure you handle your business.
translation.zh: 因为我的责任是确保你做好你的工作

translation.en: What are you even talking about?
translation.zh: 你在说什么？

translation.en: It's a fact that the best man has his pick
translation.zh: 众所周知 伴郎会在婚礼上

translation.en: of the single ladies at the wedding.
translation.zh: 从在场的单身女性中选出他的另一半

translation.en: I don't want you making me look bad.
translation.zh: 我不想你让我丢脸

translation.en: You don't need me. You make yourself look bad.
translation.zh:
你不需要我来做
你自己本身就很丢脸

translation.en: Look at that Afro. It's not coming back the third time.
translation.zh:
看看你的爆炸头
这个发型早过时了

translation.en: You know what? Just give me the ring. Come on.
translation.zh: 行了 把戒指给我 快点

translation.en: Oh, ring... Uh...
translation.zh: 戒指…

translation.en: Uh, must've packed it in the bag.
translation.zh: 肯定是放在那个包里了

translation.en: Megan told me you skipped out on dance lessons, okay.
translation.zh: 梅根告诉我你逃了舞蹈课 好吗？

translation.en: It's the first dance, man. It means a lot to her, so lock it in.
translation.zh:
婚礼上你们可是要跳第一支舞的
这对她很重要 所以赶紧练好它

translation.en: Do you know I'm a natural dancer?
translation.zh: 你知道我是个天生的舞者吗？

translation.en: You know, my pop-lock is on fleek. You know... Bah, bah!

translation.en: -We here ask the questions. -Why would somebody want to do that?
translation.zh:
-我们才是询问的人
-为什么会有人想要这么做？

translation.en: That's what we need to figure out. Do you have any enemies, Rob?
translation.zh:
这是我们需要查清楚的事
罗伯 你有什么死对头吗？

translation.en: -Somebody opposed to the wedding? -Maybe a jilted lover?
translation.zh:
-某个反对你们结婚的人？
-被抛弃的情人？

translation.en: In-laws you don't get along with?
translation.zh: 关系不好的女方亲属？

translation.en: Maybe somebody who feels, I don't know, you're immature?
translation.zh: 也许有人觉得你…不成熟？

translation.en: -Unreliable? -Or both?
translation.zh:
-不可靠？
-不成熟加不可靠？

translation.en: Um... Not-- not that I know of.
translation.zh: 我认识的人里没有

translation.en: I mean, you know, I mean...
translation.zh: 我是说 我的意思是…

translation.en: Nobody threw us a party or anything, but that doesn't mean much, right?
translation.zh:
没人为我们举行派对或什么的
但这说明不了什么 不是吗？

translation.en: Yeah, okay, listen, guys, I may be marrying up, okay?
translation.zh:
嗯 好吧 听我说 伙计们
我也许是要娶个高门女 好吗？

translation.en: -But I have my moments. -We've seen your moments.
translation.zh:
-不过 我也有优点
-我们看到了你的优点

translation.en: -Not pretty. -We love each other.
translation.zh:
-很辣眼
-我们彼此相爱

translation.en: And that's what counts. Right?
translation.zh: 这才是重要的 不是吗？

translation.en: We'll be okay.
translation.zh: 我们会幸福的

translation.en: I hope we'll be okay.
translation.zh: 我希望我们会幸福

translation.en: Let me rephrase the question.
translation.zh: 让我改述一下这个问题

translation.en: Do you know of anyone else, other than yourself,
translation.zh: 除了你自己 你是否知道有其他人

translation.en: who doesn't think you're ready to get married?
translation.zh: 认为你没准备好结婚？

translation.en: -No. -[knock on door]
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: How's my little Meg-pie?
translation.zh: 我的梅根小可爱还好吗？

translation.en: I've left Rob a dozen messages, Dad, and nothing.
translation.zh:
爸爸 我给罗伯发了很多信息
但他一条也没回

translation.en: I'm really worried.
translation.zh: 我很担心

translation.en: Sweetheart, the candles have burned out, the doves escaped...
translation.zh:
甜心 婚礼上的蜡烛已经燃尽了
鸽子都飞跑了…

translation.en: and the aroma down there is getting... unhealthy.
translation.zh:
楼下屋子里的香氛变得…
不利于人体健康

translation.en: Well, what are you saying?
translation.zh: 你什么意思？

translation.en: Rob wouldn't just run out on me. Something terrible must've happened.
translation.zh:
罗伯不会抛弃我
肯定是发生了什么坏事

translation.en: -Well, maybe it's for the best. -Are you serious?
translation.zh:
-也许这对彼此双方都好
-你说真的？

translation.en: He could be dead!
translation.zh: 他可能出事死了！

translation.en: And that would be terrible, but he'd want you to move on.
translation.zh:
这的确很糟糕
不过他会希望你翻篇儿

translation.en: Look, sweetheart, I'm just saying that you have so much to offer.
translation.zh:
听着 甜心 我只是想说
你有这么多的优点

translation.en: Thousands, probably millions of people could make you just as happy.
translation.zh:
成千上万 也许上百万的人
也能让你幸福

translation.en: Megan, what your father is saying is that you deserve better than this.
translation.zh:
梅根 你父亲想说的是
你值得拥有比他更好的人

translation.en: You're a successful doctor. He is a substitute teacher.
translation.zh:
你是个成功的医生
他只是个代课老师

translation.en: It doesn't even make sense.
translation.zh: 他根本就配不上你

translation.en: Cody, you wanted me to leave medicine so that I could be on-call
translation.zh:
科迪 你想要我辞掉医院的工作 这样你的白痴工作有需要时
我就能随叫随到

translation.en: -for your stupid work events. -Hmm.
translation.zh:
这样你的白痴工作有需要时
我就能随叫随到

translation.en: Rob is actually proud of what I do. He understands how much it means to me.
translation.zh:
罗伯是真正为我的工作自豪的人
他理解这份工作对我有多大意义

translation.en: Daddy, Rob supports me in every way.
translation.zh: 爸爸 罗伯给了我方方面面的支持

translation.en: Except financially.
translation.zh: 只除了金钱方面

translation.en: Did I just step into a time warp and reemerge in the 1950s?
translation.zh:
我是不是刚才掉进了时间隧道
来到了20世纪50年代？

translation.en: Okay, I just talked to Benny, and he said that Rob called almost an hour ago.
translation.zh:
好吧 我刚问了本尼
他说大约一个小时前罗伯打了电话来

translation.en: What? Why didn't he call me?
translation.zh: 什么？他为什么不打电话给我？

translation.en: -Hey, Cody. -Lupe.
translation.zh:
-嘿 科迪
-卢佩

translation.en: -It's Vicky, but... it's fine. -[cell phone vibrating]
translation.zh: 我的名字是维姬 不过…没关系

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 喂？

translation.en: Rob, where are you?
translation.zh: 罗伯 你在哪儿？

translation.en: -Well, I've been stuck in an elevator. -What?
translation.zh:
-我被困在了一台电梯里
-什么？

translation.en: I swear to God, I've been stuck in an elevator for the last eight hours.
translation.zh:
我对天发誓 过去的八个小时
我一直被困在一台电梯里

translation.en: Oh, my God. Are you okay?
translation.zh: 我的天啊 你没事吧？

translation.en: Yeah, baby, I'm fine.
translation.zh: 嗯 宝贝 我没事

translation.en: I just really wanted your wedding day to be perfect.
translation.zh: 我只是真的想给你一个完美的婚礼

translation.en: It will be, once you're in it. How soon can you get here?
translation.zh:
会的 只要你能出现在婚礼上
你多久才能赶来这里？

translation.en: Well... funny story!
translation.zh: 有件事挺搞笑的！

translation.en: -I managed to get arrested. -For what?
translation.zh:
-我把自己弄进了监狱
-因为什么？

translation.en: Because I may have ran butt-naked through the Bridge Run.
translation.zh:
因为我可能光着屁股
闯进了库珀河大桥马拉松大赛

translation.en: Rob, I don't understand.
translation.zh: 罗伯 我不明白

translation.en: I'm only sharing this with you because it's gonna be on the news
translation.zh:
我把这事告诉你
是因为今晚这就会上新闻

translation.en: at five, six, seven and 11.
translation.zh:
下午五点、六点和
晚上七点、十一点都会播

translation.en: -[church bells ringing] -Are you not coming?
translation.zh: 你在说什么？你不来了吗？

translation.en: Megan, it's gonna be okay. I can fix this.
translation.zh:
梅根 一切都会好的
我能处理好这事

translation.en: -Baby, I love you. -[rumbling]
translation.zh: 宝贝 我爱你

translation.en: -Hello? -Wait, Rob, I can't hear you.
translation.zh:
-喂？
-等等 罗伯 我听不见你在说什么

translation.en: -I said, "I love you!" -[distorted] Rob?
translation.zh: 我刚才说 “我爱你！” 罗伯？

translation.en: Hello? Megan, did you feel that?
translation.zh: 喂？梅根 你感觉到了么？

translation.en: -Rob! -What the--
translation.zh:
-罗伯！
-搞什么…

translation.en: -Hello? -Megan!
translation.zh:
-喂？
-梅根！

translation.en: I don't know what's happening!
translation.zh: 我不知道是怎么回事！

translation.en: Rob!
translation.zh: 罗伯！

translation.en: [man] Hey, did you hear that?
translation.zh: 嘿 你听到了吗？

translation.en: -I think somebody's in there. -[pounding]
translation.zh: 我觉得里面有人

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 有人吗？

translation.en: [man] Hang on, buddy, were coming!
translation.zh: 坚持住 伙计 我们马上就来！

translation.en: All right, I think we got it.
translation.zh: 好了 我想我们把电梯弄好了

translation.en: -[man 2] Finally! -[scattered applause]
translation.zh: 终于修好了！

translation.en: You know what? Screw it. I have been here for 20 minutes, so...
translation.zh:
知道吗？随便吧
我已经等了20分钟了 所以…

translation.en: are you in or out, guy?
translation.zh: 伙计 你是要进来还是出去？

translation.en: That can't be right.
translation.zh: 怎么可能？

translation.en: Excuse me, do you have the time?
translation.zh: 打扰一下 现在几点了？

translation.en: -This is Benny. -Benny?
translation.zh:
-我是本尼
-本尼？

translation.en: -Rob, where are you, man? -I'm at the hotel. Where are you?
translation.zh:
-罗伯 你在哪儿？
-我在酒店 你呢？

translation.en: -I am at the church. -Still?
translation.zh:
-我在教堂
-还是在教堂？

translation.en: What do you mean "still"?
translation.zh: 你说“还是”是什么意思？

translation.en: Don't tell me you got cold feet, man.
translation.zh: 别告诉我你要临阵退缩

translation.en: Benny, where's Megan? Is she still there?
translation.zh: 本尼 梅根呢？她还在那边吗？

translation.en: Yes, we're all here. Where are you?
translation.zh:
是的 我们都在教堂这里
你在哪儿？

translation.en: I guess I'm on my way.
translation.zh: 我想我在去教堂的路上

translation.en: Okay, cool. Hey, listen...
translation.zh: 好吧 很好 嘿 听着…

translation.en: -About the programs, I was-- -Negro.
translation.zh:
-关于婚礼安排手册的事 我…
-你这黑鬼

translation.en: Oh, my God, it's Brian McKnight!
translation.zh: 天啊 是布莱恩麦肯奈特！

translation.en: -You're naked. -Yeah, I know. It's crazy, right?
translation.zh:
-你没穿衣服
-嗯 我知道 这很疯狂 不是吗？

translation.en: Especially 'cause you're the one that does the panty-dropping song.
translation.zh: 因为你写的歌好听得会让人掉裤子

translation.en: I write love songs, and I'm kind of struggling with this one,
translation.zh:
我只写情歌 而且现在
正绞尽脑汁想这首该怎么写

translation.en: -so if you don't mind... -Sorry. Go ahead. Do your process.
translation.zh:
-所以 如果你不介意…
-请继续 创作你的歌曲

translation.en: Man, I just wanna tell you, man, I love your music. Oh!
translation.zh:
老兄 我只想告诉你
我爱死你的歌了

translation.en: I mean, my fiancée,
translation.zh: 我是说 我的未婚妻

translation.en: she really loves your music.
translation.zh: 她爱死你的歌了

translation.en: Man, if you only knew how many times we did it to your songs.
translation.zh:
要是你知道我们听着你的歌
做了多少次

translation.en: -Oh, man, you would feel creepy right now. -I get the picture.
translation.zh:
-老天 你现在会觉得毛骨悚然的
-我能想象出来

translation.en: Hey, man, let me ask you, how do you do that thing in the videos,
translation.zh:
嘿 我想问个问题
你是怎么做出视频里那个动作的？

translation.en: you know, when you got your shirt open and your chest is greasy,
translation.zh: 当你衬衫敞开着 胸膛油亮发光

translation.en: and the wind is blowing you, and you're doing this right here?
translation.zh:
大风吹在你身上
你在风中像这样舞动

translation.en: -Man, I think that is incredible. -[chuckles] Right.
translation.zh:
-老天 我觉得那真是不可思议
-好吧

translation.en: You know, it really seems like me and you are bonding.
translation.zh: 看起来你我真的很有缘

translation.en: I just wanna know if, um...
translation.zh: 我只是想知道…

translation.en: you could loan me your pants?
translation.zh: 你是否愿意把裤子借给我？

translation.en: -I don't think that's such a good idea. -No?
translation.zh:
-我觉得这个主意不太好
-不行？

translation.en: That's how you gonna do me? Oh, I see, "Make fun of the naked guy."
translation.zh:
你就打算这样对待我？
我懂了 “嘲笑这个光屁股的家伙”

translation.en: You know what? You should be ashamed of yourself.
translation.zh: 你知道吗？你该为自己感到羞耻

translation.en: [laughs] Hey, you are a strange dude, but you just helped me write a hit.
translation.zh:
嘿 你是个奇怪的家伙
不过我想你刚给了我点灵感

translation.en: So I'd like to help you out.
translation.zh: 所以我愿意帮你一把

translation.en: ♪ You should be ashamed of yourself ♪
translation.zh: 你该为自己感到羞耻

translation.en: ♪ Yes, yeah, yeah ♪
translation.zh: 是的 没错

translation.en: ♪ You should be ashamed of yourself ♪
translation.zh: 你该为自己感到羞耻

translation.en: Did I write that?
translation.zh: 这是我写的？

translation.en: ♪ You should be ashamed of yourself ♪
translation.zh: 你该为自己感到羞耻

translation.en: Damn, he's good.
translation.zh: 天 他可真棒

translation.en: What the--
translation.zh: 怎么…

translation.en: Vicky?
translation.zh: 维姬？

translation.en: Yeah, so Benny said you called nearly an hour ago.
translation.zh:
是我 本尼说大约一个小时前
你给他打了电话

translation.en: Where are you?
translation.zh: 你在哪儿？

translation.en: -I just got to the hotel. -Hotel? Rob, what is going on?
translation.zh:
-我刚到酒店
-酒店？罗伯 怎么回事？

translation.en: I don't know. Hey, Rob Anderson. I need to get in my room. Thank you.
translation.zh:
我不知道 嘿 我是罗伯安德森
我需要进入我的房间 谢谢

translation.en: Oh, my God. You're going back to your room. That is a bold move.
translation.zh:
老天 你要回你的房间
这举动可真是大胆

translation.en: Vicky, I don't have time for this right now, okay?
translation.zh:
维姬 我现在没时间
跟你讨论这个 好吗？

translation.en: I'm having some serious issues!
translation.zh: 我这里事情很严重！

translation.en: What could be more serious than missing your wedding?
translation.zh:
还有什么事能比
你错过自己的婚礼更严重？

translation.en: The fact that we did this already?
translation.zh: 我们不是已经走过场了？

translation.en: That is called a "rehearsal." You are unbelievable.
translation.zh:
那叫“婚礼彩排”
这话你也说得出来

translation.en: But I'm not surprised. I think we all knew how this was gonna end.
translation.zh:
但老实讲我不感到意外 我想我们
早就知道这婚结不成

translation.en: I'm gonna need to see your ID, sir.
translation.zh: 请出示您的身份证 先生

translation.en: -It's in my room. -Right.
translation.zh:
-身份证在我房间里
-对了

translation.en: You know this is why it didn't work out between us, right?
translation.zh:
你知道这就是为何
咱俩为何走不下去 对吗？

translation.en: Because you're not a man and you never will be.
translation.zh:
因为你不是个男人
也永远成不了一个男人

translation.en: Wait, what are you even talking about? I got kidnapped last night!
translation.zh:
等等 你在瞎扯什么？
我昨晚被绑架了！

translation.en: -"I got kidnapped last night." Wow. -[church bells ringing]
translation.zh: “我昨晚被绑架了” 你可真会编

translation.en: Somebody's trying to sabotage my wedding, and I'm gonna find out who it is.
translation.zh: 有人想破坏我的婚礼 我要找出这个人是谁

translation.en: That could be anybody, Rob. [laughs]
translation.zh: 可能是任何人 罗伯

translation.en: What's that loud ringing?
translation.zh: 什么声音这么响？

translation.en: Ding, dong! Ding, dong! Ding, dong!
translation.zh: 叮咚！

translation.en: Those are church bells, you idiot. Now, look, you're running out of time.
translation.zh:
是教堂的钟声 你个白痴
你快没时间了

translation.en: -You need to get here now. -Oh, I'll be there.
translation.zh:
-你必须马上赶到这里
-我会赶到那里的

translation.en: See, told you it was me.
translation.zh: 看 都告诉你这是我的房间了

translation.en: -Enjoy your stay, sir. -Thank you.
translation.zh:
-祝您住宿愉快 先生
-谢谢

translation.en: -[pounding] -Oh, no.
translation.zh: 哦 不

translation.en: No! No! No!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: [man] Finally.
translation.zh: 终于修好了！

translation.en: Hey!
translation.zh: 干嘛！

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: Hey!
translation.zh: 干嘛！

translation.en: Watch it, crazy.
translation.zh: 看着点 疯子

translation.en: Bro, that was--
translation.zh: 老兄 这可是…

translation.en: -A microbrew. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-限量生产的微酿啤酒
-没错

translation.en: -No. -Right on, man.
translation.zh:
-不会吧
-说得真对 老兄

translation.en: Bro!
translation.zh: 老兄！

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 我的天啊

translation.en: Oh... What the hell? God!
translation.zh: 搞什么？天啊！

translation.en: Excuse me.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: -Hey! -I gotta go.
translation.zh:
-嗨！
-我尿急

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 喂？

translation.en: Mom, I need your help.
translation.zh: 妈妈 我需要你的帮助

translation.en: Rob, where are you? Do you know what time it is?
translation.zh:
罗伯 你在哪里？
你知道现在几点了吗？

translation.en: Mom, I'm freaking out. I'm butt-ass naked. I'm 20 blocks from the hotel,
translation.zh:
妈妈 我快疯了 我现在光着屁股
在距离酒店20个街区的地方

translation.en: and I keep repeating the same hour over and over again.
translation.zh:
而且过去一小时的事情
一遍又一遍地在我身上重复上演

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: You naked... in public?
translation.zh: 你在公众场合…光着屁股？

translation.en: Yes! This is the worst day of my life, and I can't get it to end.
translation.zh:
没错！这是我一生中最糟糕的一天
我还不能让它结束

translation.en: Calm down, baby.
translation.zh: 冷静 宝贝

translation.en: Now, you ain't got no clothes on?
translation.zh: 你现在身上一丝不挂？

translation.en: I'm wearing a shopping bag.
translation.zh: 我穿着一个购物袋

translation.en: Can you find some other trash that you can make a shirt out of?
translation.zh: 你不能找到其他能穿的垃圾？

translation.en: No, Mom, all my stuff is back at the hotel.
translation.zh:
没有 妈妈 我所有的东西
都在酒店房间里

translation.en: -Well, go on back to the hotel then! -I told you, I don't have time.
translation.zh:
-那就回酒店去！
-我说过了 我没时间

translation.en: I have one hour, and every time the church bells ring,
translation.zh:
我只有一个小时
每次教堂钟声响起时

translation.en: I get sent back to the...
translation.zh: 我就会被送回…

translation.en: Mom, put the pastor on.
translation.zh: 妈妈 让牧师接电话

translation.en: All right, good talk.
translation.zh: 好吧 和你聊得很愉快

translation.en: Father Butterfield!
translation.zh: 巴特菲尔德神父！

translation.en: Psst. Phone!
translation.zh: 你的电话！

translation.en: -This is Father Butterfield. -Yes, this is Rob, the groom.
translation.zh:
-我是巴特菲尔德神父
-我是新郎罗伯

translation.en: Listen, I was wondering if it's at all possible,
translation.zh: 听着 我想知道有没有可能

translation.en: can you, like, not ring the church bells for like a hour, an hour and a half?
translation.zh:
你能不能等上一个小时
或一个半小时再敲钟

translation.en: Because I think the church bells are sending me back in time.
translation.zh:
因为我觉得教堂的钟声
会把我送回过去

translation.en: Son, in our 208-year history,
translation.zh: 孩子 在我们教堂建立的208年里

translation.en: we've never once missed the bells or a wedding.
translation.zh:
我们从未迟敲过一次钟
或错过一场婚礼

translation.en: [scoffs] You mean to tell me you never missed one wedding?
translation.zh:
你是想告诉我
你们从未错过一场婚礼？

translation.en: Like, not even for the plague?
translation.zh: 哪怕是在瘟疫蔓延的时候？

translation.en: -How can you account for that? -Faith.
translation.zh: 你怎么解释这个？ 信念

translation.en: Or you are sending me back in time.
translation.zh: 或者是你在把我送回过去

translation.en: Well, not you, but, like... God.
translation.zh: 不是你 而…而是上帝

translation.en: -[church bells ringing] -He's giving me a second chance.
translation.zh: 他要给我第二次机会

translation.en: We're booked till August. If you're thinking about rescheduling...
translation.zh:
八月前教堂的预订都排满了
如果你要重新安排…

translation.en: Well, apparently I don't have to. This wedding is happening!
translation.zh:
显然我不必这么做
婚礼马上就要开始了！

translation.en: So does that mean you're coming?
translation.zh: 那么说你会来参加婚礼啦？

translation.en: Maybe not to this one, but I'm coming.
translation.zh: 也许不是这个婚礼…但我会来

translation.en: Remember me?
translation.zh: 记得我吗？

translation.en: -Okay. -♪ Hello, loneliness ♪
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Hey, I just wanna say I'm sorry about earlier. No hard feelings?
translation.zh:
嘿 我只想为我刚才的所作所为
说句对不起 你没生气吧？

translation.en: You don't even know, huh?
translation.zh: 你都不知道我在说什么吧？

translation.en: All right, people, move out of my way. Brother gotta go.
translation.zh: 好了 大家 请让让 兄弟我得走了

translation.en: Hey, nerds, you guys got a skateboard, some Heelys or something?
translation.zh:
嘿 书呆子们 你们有滑板
或是暴走鞋什么的吗？

translation.en: Hey, soccer mom. Ma'am, please. No? Thank you.
translation.zh:
嘿 足球妈妈
拜托帮个忙 不？谢谢

translation.en: Hey, sister, you got a bus pass, anything? God damn.
translation.zh:
嘿 你有公交车票吗？
任何我能…该死

translation.en: Hi. Hi, ma'am, can you please help me?
translation.zh: 嘿 女士 拜托你能帮我个忙吗？

translation.en: What the hell?
translation.zh: 搞什么鬼？

translation.en: Where's the keys? Oh, keys?
translation.zh: 钥匙呢？钥匙？

translation.en: Keys? Where do you put keys on a bike?
translation.zh: 钥匙？摩托车钥匙都放哪儿了啊？

translation.en: You want to buy it a drink?
translation.zh: 你想请它喝一杯吗？

translation.en: Hey... um...
translation.zh: 嘿…

translation.en: Drill?
translation.zh: 德里尔？

translation.en: I was just... checking out your bike.
translation.zh: 我只是…看看你们的摩托车

translation.en: I thought about getting a bike myself,
translation.zh: 我想给自己买辆摩托车 但是

translation.en: but you know, my girl said it's too dangerous.
translation.zh: 我女朋友说这车太危险了

translation.en: You know how old ladies are, right?
translation.zh: 你知道女人的想法有多老气 对吧？

translation.en: -Who he talking about? -You calling my lady old, man?
translation.zh:
-他在说谁？
-老兄 你说我女朋友老气？

translation.en: No, not that you old. You got a young face.
translation.zh: 不 我没说你老 你看起来很年轻

translation.en: This dude knows what I mean. My man. Bra.
translation.zh:
这位兄弟懂我的意思
我的兄弟 老兄

translation.en: -Oh, boy. -Did he just knock down my bike?
translation.zh:
-老天
-他是不是刚碰倒了我的摩托车？

translation.en: -He knocked down the bike. -No! It jumped. I didn't...
translation.zh:
-他碰倒了摩托车
-不！它自己倒的 我没…

translation.en: -No, I didn't do it. -You didn't do it? You got some money?
translation.zh:
-不 不是我碰倒的
-你没碰倒它？你有钱吗？

translation.en: Just this.
translation.zh: 只有这些

translation.en: Eat it.
translation.zh: 给我吃了

translation.en: That's kind of unsanitary.
translation.zh: 这有点不卫生

translation.en: -I ain't eating-- -Eat it!
translation.zh:
-我是不会吃…
-快吃！

translation.en: I think I got a half a dollar stuck in my larynx.
translation.zh: 好像50美分的硬币卡在我的喉咙里了

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: You look like you got lost on your way to the shower.
translation.zh: 你看起来像是去洗澡时迷路了

translation.en: -I was just on my way to my wedding. -[woman] He ain't gonna make it.
translation.zh:
-我只是要赶去结婚
-他赶不到的

translation.en: He ain't gonna make it, huh? Well, you need a ride?
translation.zh: 他要赶不上了 需要我送你一程吗？

translation.en: Are you serious? You would...
translation.zh: 你说真的？你愿意…

translation.en: -You would do that for me? -Yeah, of course.
translation.zh:
-你愿意送我一程？
-没错 当然

translation.en: You guys!
translation.zh: 你们真是好人！

translation.en: Yeah, I would love a ride. Thank you.
translation.zh:
是 我很愿意你们送我一程
谢谢你们

translation.en: -Call an ambulance. -An ambulance?
translation.zh:
-打电话叫救护车
-叫救护车？

translation.en: Okay, guys, please. Please! Please! I got my ass kicked twice already. Twice.
translation.zh:
好吧 伙计们 拜托
我已经被修理过两回了 两回啊

translation.en: It's his wedding day! I think he need a shave!
translation.zh:
今天是他的大喜之日！
我觉得他需要剃一剃毛！

translation.en: I just want this to be over.
translation.zh: 我只想结束这场闹剧

translation.en: I spent the last six months talking about locations.
translation.zh: 我过去六个月一直在讨论婚礼地点

translation.en: By the way, you have a very beautiful city.
translation.zh: 顺便一提 你们这个城市真美

translation.en: -[screams] -Hold him down like that, man!
translation.zh: 把他往下按！使劲儿往下按！

translation.en: She even made me take dance lessons!
translation.zh: 她甚至还要我去上舞蹈课！

translation.en: Hey, let him up. I wanna see this. Let him up!
translation.zh:
嘿 让他起来 我想看看
让他起来！

translation.en: Show me.
translation.zh: 让我看看

translation.en: Sh-- Sh-- Show you what?
translation.zh: 让你看什么？

translation.en: Our dance routine?
translation.zh: 我们的舞蹈动作？

translation.en: Well, I didn't really learn it.
translation.zh: 其实我都没学会

translation.en: I didn't think it was terribly important at the time.
translation.zh: 当时我觉得这不是特别重要

translation.en: -[woman] Oh, no. -What?
translation.zh:
-不是吧
-什么？

translation.en: [Rob] Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: -That's the centerpiece of the reception. -All right. All right.
translation.zh:
-那可是庆祝会的精华部分
-好吧

translation.en: Come on, back up. Give him room now. Give him room. Let him breathe.
translation.zh:
好了 退后 给他腾出地方
让他好好喘气

translation.en: Can I use your man right there?
translation.zh: 我能借用你那边的那位兄弟吗？

translation.en: I come up and-- You first come up and--
translation.zh:
好吧 那你…我靠上前…
你也先靠上前 然后…

translation.en: -Slap it hard. -[all] Oh! Come here and you grab like this.
translation.zh:
狠狠拍下这里
过来 像这样搂住这里

translation.en: You my bitch. Okay, I lead, you follow.
translation.zh: 你是我的婆娘 好了 我领舞 你跟着我跳

translation.en: And then, I come around like this here, and I dip you.
translation.zh: 然后我转到你身后 斜抱住你

translation.en: But your big ass is too big to dip.
translation.zh: 但你块头太大 我抱不住

translation.en: Bring you back up, and then I start slow grinding 'cause it's our way.
translation.zh:
然后让你站起来 接着开始慢慢
往你身上蹭 因为我们都爱这样

translation.en: -Come on, man! -Come on! Just a slow grind!
translation.zh:
-别这样！真是够了！
-来嘛！慢慢蹭一下而已！

translation.en: And that leads you into the Running Man like... Oh, oh, oh, oh!
translation.zh: 接下来我领着你做奔跑的动作…

translation.en: And slide and pose.
translation.zh: 然后滑下来 摆这个姿势

translation.en: And then I pull myself back up, and then start pop-locking.
translation.zh: 然后我把自己拉起来 开始跳机械舞

translation.en: Listen to my crowd when I pop like... 'cause it's so hard.
translation.zh:
听听我跳舞时人们的赞叹声…
因为我跳的舞难度太高了

translation.en: They start whopping 'cause black girls love to whop.
translation.zh:
他们开始舞动
因为黑人女孩子喜欢跳舞

translation.en: -Hey! Hey! -Hey.
translation.zh:
-嘿！
-嘿

translation.en: Then you show them your flexibility. You be like... oh! Oh!
translation.zh:
然后向他们展示
你身体有多灵活 就像…

translation.en: After that, we all get in a circle like...
translation.zh: 之后 我们围成一圈…

translation.en: Work that body.
translation.zh: 舞动你的身体

translation.en: Break it down.
translation.zh: 做个街舞动作

translation.en: Hey, cut that out, man!
translation.zh: 嘿 停下！

translation.en: You got me up here doing a Bobby Brown dance.
translation.zh: 你居然让我在这里跳鲍比布朗的舞

translation.en: -[woman] You don't. -I don't dance!
translation.zh:
-是啊
-我不会跳舞！

translation.en: No, you don't!
translation.zh: 没错！

translation.en: Okay, so, I may have missed a few classes or two.
translation.zh: 好吧 我大概是缺了几节课

translation.en: What you think, baby? You think his old lady gonna like that?
translation.zh:
你觉得呢 宝贝？
你觉得他老婆会喜欢这支舞吗？

translation.en: I think she gonna kick his ass, messing up that first dance.
translation.zh:
我觉得她会因为他搞砸了
第一支舞而狠狠修理他一顿

translation.en: It's disrespectful.
translation.zh: 跳这种舞太不尊重人了

translation.en: I'd like to see that.
translation.zh: 我倒想看看他被修理的样子

translation.en: -Let's ride! -Really?
translation.zh:
-我们送他一程！
-真的？

translation.en: -Get your ass on the bike! -Hey, but I ain't riding bitch!
translation.zh:
-赶紧上车！
-嘿 我可不骑这破玩意儿！

translation.en: -[man] Who you calling "bitch"? -Unless you want me to. [chuckles]
translation.zh:
-你叫谁“破玩意儿”？
-除非你们想让我骑

translation.en: Let's go!
translation.zh: 出发！

translation.en: We got this. We got this.
translation.zh: 我搞得定的

translation.en: We got it, baby!
translation.zh: 我会骑了 宝贝！

translation.en: [grunts] No!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: -Okay. -What happened?
translation.zh:
-好了
-发生了什么事？我在哪儿？

translation.en: -You hit a barricade at 40 miles an hour. -Where am I?
translation.zh:
你以每小时64公里的速度
撞上了混凝土路障

translation.en: -All right, what's your name? -It's Rob. Rob Anderson.
translation.zh:
-好了 你叫什么名字？
-我叫罗伯 罗伯安德森

translation.en: And, Rob, can you tell me what day it is?
translation.zh: 罗伯？你知道今天是几月几号吗？

translation.en: It's my wedding day. It's my wedding day.
translation.zh: 今天是我结婚的日子

translation.en: I gotta get ready. I'm getting married right there at that church!
translation.zh: 我得准备好 我就在那座教堂结婚！

translation.en: -You're suffering from a concussion. -No!
translation.zh:
-你现在还在脑震荡
-不！

translation.en: The only thing you're marrying today is a catheter.
translation.zh: 今天你只能跟导尿管“结合”

translation.en: -No. I gotta get to my wedding! -I got a better idea.
translation.zh:
-不行 我得去参加我的婚礼！
-我有个更好的主意

translation.en: You take five more CCs of Ativan.
translation.zh: 再给你打五毫升的劳拉西泮

translation.en: -No. No. No! [screams] -Rob!
translation.zh:
-不！
-罗伯！

translation.en: I want you to keep reaching out to shareholders.
translation.zh: 我要你继续接触各位股东

translation.en: Give them what they want, but do it quietly.
translation.zh:
满足他们一切要求
但别搞出动静出来

translation.en: I don't want this getting leaked before we announce next week.
translation.zh:
我不希望这事儿
在我们下周公开前走漏风声

translation.en: All right?
translation.zh: 明白吗？

translation.en: Anderson, what happened? Are you drunk?
translation.zh: 安德森 你怎么了？你喝醉了？

translation.en: I'm not drunk.
translation.zh: 我没喝醉

translation.en: I'm on drugs.
translation.zh: 我被下药了

translation.en: Oh, God. Did you just puke coins?
translation.zh: 老天 你刚才吐的是硬币？

translation.en: Would you look at that? A bicentennial.
translation.zh: 看看这个 这是两百周年纪念币

translation.en: You know, these are worth a lot of money. You keep that for me.
translation.zh: 这些硬币很值钱 帮我保管好它们

translation.en: I don't get it. In what world did she pick you over me?
translation.zh:
我不明白 她脑子里是怎么想的
竟然抛弃我而选择你

translation.en: I made a hundred mill last year.
translation.zh: 去年我可是挣了一个亿

translation.en: You made a hundred mill?
translation.zh: 你挣了一个亿？

translation.en: I should fucking rob you.
translation.zh: 我真他妈该抢劫你

translation.en: Why are you dressed like some Vegas housewife,
translation.zh:
你为什么穿得像个
拉斯维加斯的家庭主妇？

translation.en: with your gross, busted up arm?
translation.zh: 还有你那恶心的手怎么断了？

translation.en: Seriously, is that thing real?
translation.zh: 老实说 是真的吗？

translation.en: What are you talking about? This...
translation.zh: 你在说什么？ 这…

translation.en: -That's pretty broken. -Yeah, it looks like a Krazy Straw.
translation.zh:
-断得可真厉害
-是啊 看起来就像根旋转吸管

translation.en: It kind of does. Look at...
translation.zh: 是有点像 我吸吸看…

translation.en: It's not really a straw.
translation.zh: 它不是真吸管

translation.en: Watch this.
translation.zh: 看好了

translation.en: -Oh, no! No! -[screams]
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: [laughs] I can't feel a thing!
translation.zh: 我一点儿也不疼！

translation.en: You know, that girl has been dreaming about this day her entire life,
translation.zh:
你知道吗？
梅根一直都在梦想着这一天

translation.en: and this is...
translation.zh: 而你这样子…

translation.en: [sighs] what you're bringing to the table?
translation.zh: 你就这样对她？

translation.en: You're so right.
translation.zh: 你说得对极了

translation.en: She's not gonna marry me looking like this.
translation.zh: 她不会嫁给这个样子的我

translation.en: I just want a hug.
translation.zh: 我只是需要一个拥抱

translation.en: Look, showing up is half the battle. The other half is pants.
translation.zh:
听着 你能来就成功了一半
另一半取决于裤子

translation.en: Go home and put some pants on, for God's sakes. Go! [snaps fingers]
translation.zh:
看在上帝的份上
回家找条裤子穿上 快去！

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 赶紧

translation.en: I-- I see what's going on here.
translation.zh: 我明白是怎么回事了

translation.en: You want me to waltz on out of here so that I can miss my wedding, huh?
translation.zh:
你想要我离开教堂
这样我就会错过我的婚礼 对吗？

translation.en: Oh, yeah, because your little plot...
translation.zh: 没错 因为你那个…

translation.en: to leave me trapped inside the elevator...
translation.zh: 将我困在电梯里的小阴谋…

translation.en: blew up in your...
translation.zh: 直接被我…

translation.en: Whoo, I am high.
translation.zh: 我晕晕乎乎的

translation.en: ...face.
translation.zh: 戳穿

translation.en: First of all, that sounds like a terrible plan,
translation.zh: 第一 这计划听起来很糟糕

translation.en: and second, I have three women who can confirm I was in my hotel room with them all night.
translation.zh:
第二 有三个女人能证明我整晚
都和她们待在我的酒店房间里

translation.en: Third, if I wanted to ruin your wedding,
translation.zh: 第三 如果我想要毁了你的婚礼

translation.en: I'd just let you walk in there right now.
translation.zh: 我只需现在让你走进教堂

translation.en: Which I just realized would be absolutely perfect.
translation.zh: 我刚发现这个主意挺不错的

translation.en: -Come on, let's go get you married. -I don't...
translation.zh:
-来吧 我送你进去结婚
-我不…

translation.en: -Here we go. -I don't wanna get married.
translation.zh:
-我们走
-我不想结婚

translation.en: Just gonna walk right in.
translation.zh: 往右走…

translation.en: -[church bells ringing] -Wait, hold on! It's the wedding bells!
translation.zh: 等等 等一下！是婚礼的钟声！

translation.en: Ah, thank God!
translation.zh: 啊 谢天谢地！

translation.en: -♪ Bye-bye, happiness ♪ -I need pants.
translation.zh: 我需要一条裤子

translation.en: -Hey! Call an ambulance! -Why?
translation.zh:
-嘿！打电话叫救护车！
-为什么？

translation.en: Damn.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: Hey!
translation.zh: 嗨！

translation.en: -[exhales] -Yes! Whoo! My man's in the house!
translation.zh: 太好了！新郎倌来了！

translation.en: -Come on, everybody, give it up! -[cheering]
translation.zh: 来啊 大家 鼓掌欢迎他！ 嗨！

translation.en: [man shouting] Rob! Rob!
translation.zh: 罗伯！

translation.en: [whispers] Don't ask, just...
translation.zh: 什么都别问…

translation.en: These are tight.
translation.zh: 这衣服太紧了

translation.en: -[Ben] What you got on? -I'm adjusting this.
translation.zh:
-你穿的是什么？
-我在伸展

translation.en: It goes over to the side. That's weird.
translation.zh: 它总是往旁边跑 感觉很怪

translation.en: -Aw, come on, brother. -No, just pull it back, pull it down.
translation.zh:
-不是吧 兄弟
-不 把它往后拉 往下拉就好

translation.en: -I can't. -Pull it down. Okay, stop that hurts.
translation.zh:
-我拉不下去
-好吧 别拉了 疼死我了

translation.en: Okay. Just relax.
translation.zh: 好的 放轻松

translation.en: Yeah, that ain't got room for that. Okay.
translation.zh: 衣服不够大 就这样

translation.en: I'll be right back.
translation.zh: 我马上回来

translation.en: Aw, baby...
translation.zh: 宝贝…

translation.en: Baby, I'm sorry. I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: 宝贝 抱歉 真对不起

translation.en: I just grabbed the first thing I could find.
translation.zh:
我只能穿着我能找到的
第一身衣服赶过来

translation.en: It just needs to be taken out in the back, just a little bit.
translation.zh:
只是需要往后拉一拉
稍微拉一下就行

translation.en: -Oh, I'm gonna take it out in the back. -[stammers]
translation.zh: 我来帮你拉拉“后面”

translation.en: Baby, I think we're going to the cleaners.
translation.zh: 等等！宝贝 我以为我们要去干洗店

translation.en: -Daddy, no! -[church bells ringing]
translation.zh: 爸爸 不！

translation.en: If you're gonna show up in that, then don't show up at all.
translation.zh:
要是你打算穿成这样出现
那干脆不要出现

translation.en: If you're gonna show up in that, then don't show up at all.
translation.zh:
要是你打算穿成这样出现
那干脆不要出现

translation.en: I've tried everything:
translation.zh: 我什么衣服都试过了

translation.en: smart corduroy, seersucker, a Nehru jacket.
translation.zh:
灯芯绒休闲西装
泡泡纱时装 尼赫鲁装

translation.en: -What do you want from me? -I want you to be somebody else.
translation.zh:
-你究竟想要我怎样？
-我想把你换掉

translation.en: Megan is the only daughter I have.
translation.zh: 梅根是我的独生女

translation.en: I didn't raise her alone, put her through medical school
translation.zh:
我独自一人把她抚养长大
供她读完医学院

translation.en: just to watch some lazy, thoughtless loser come along and screw it up.
translation.zh:
可不是为了看着某个懒惰
不懂事的废物出现并毁了她的一辈子

translation.en: Let's face it...
translation.zh: 实话说吧…

translation.en: you don't like me because I'm not a fancy businessman like you or Cody.
translation.zh:
你不喜欢我 是因为我不是
像你或科迪那样的成功商人

translation.en: I don't dislike you for who you are, Rob.
translation.zh: 我不喜欢的不是你的身份 罗伯

translation.en: It's that you have no goals, no ambition, no career.
translation.zh:
我不喜欢的是你没有目标
没有野心 没有事业

translation.en: I'm a substitute teacher.
translation.zh: 我是个代课老师

translation.en: Robert, marriage is not a part-time thing.
translation.zh: 罗伯特 婚姻不是兼职

translation.en: I built a multinational company from the ground up,
translation.zh: 我白手起家 建立起一家跨国公司

translation.en: and the toughest job I ever had was being a husband.
translation.zh:
而我遇到的最困难的工作
就是做一名丈夫

translation.en: I'm talking long hours, overtime...
translation.zh:
我说的是投入漫长的时间
总是要加班

translation.en: and we didn't take summers off.
translation.zh: 还没有暑假

translation.en: When I gave this ring to Megan's mother, I promised to give her everything I had.

-然后翻车
-我们差点…撞车

translation.en: Watch out!
translation.zh: 当心！

translation.en: -[shouting] -Relax. We got this. We're professionals. We do this all the time.
translation.zh:
放松 没事的 我们可是
这方面的专家 这算是家常便饭

translation.en: Why are you so nervous?
translation.zh: 你干嘛这么紧张？

translation.en: Oh, snap. Guys, can I use your phone?
translation.zh:
对了 兄弟
能借用下你们的手机吗？

translation.en: Look at your own risk.
translation.zh: 偷看你就倒大霉了

translation.en: I promise you I won't.
translation.zh: 我向你发誓我不会这么做的

translation.en: -Hello. -Hey, Callie!
translation.zh:
-喂？
-嘿 凯丽！

translation.en: Yeah, it's me, Rob, from last night.
translation.zh: 是我 罗伯 昨晚的那个人

translation.en: -Corny Rob. -Yeah, yeah, yeah, Corny Rob.
translation.zh:
-乡巴佬罗伯
-是的 乡巴佬罗伯

translation.en: Corny Rob? Yeah, I need you to do me a favor.
translation.zh: 乡巴佬罗伯？好吧 帮我个忙

translation.en: Grab my suit,
translation.zh: 拿上我的西装

translation.en: bring it down to the Second Presbyterian Church. ASAP.
translation.zh:
把它送到第二长老会教堂
好吗？越快越好

translation.en: -All right. -All right, bye.
translation.zh: 好的 好的 再见

translation.en: Whoo! Someone's getting married!
translation.zh: 有人要结婚了！

translation.en: We're never gonna make it in time.
translation.zh: 伙计们 我们没法按时赶到了

translation.en: -I think these guys know a shortcut. -[officer] Yeah?
translation.zh:
-这些家伙该知道怎么抄近路
-没错吧？

translation.en: Let's go!
translation.zh: 冲啊！

translation.en: -I'll walk. Thank you. -No, doors are locked.
translation.zh:
-别再飙车了 我走路去 谢谢
-车门锁了

translation.en: -Not getting out of here, baby. -Ride or die.
translation.zh:
-你不能在这下车 宝贝
-我们会送你到底

translation.en: Sweetheart, you have to accept the fact that he's not coming.
translation.zh: 甜心 你必须接受现实 他不会来了

translation.en: He will be here.
translation.zh: 他会来的

translation.en: He's here.
translation.zh: 他来了

translation.en: He's here!
translation.zh: 他来了！

translation.en: Yes! Whoo! My man's in the house! Come on, everybody, give it up!
translation.zh:
好极了！新郎倌来了！
来吧 大家鼓掌欢迎他！

translation.en: -You look good, man. -Thank you, brother.
translation.zh:
-你看起来很帅 哥们
-谢谢 兄弟

translation.en: Wow.
translation.zh: 哇哦

translation.en: You look amazing.
translation.zh: 你美极了

translation.en: Sir, I'd like to thank you for hosting such a wonderful service.
translation.zh:
伯父 我想感谢你
为我们举办这场如此完美的婚礼

translation.en: It's a complete disaster,
translation.zh: 这场婚礼完全是个灾难

translation.en: and I think it should be canceled.
translation.zh: 我认为应该取消它

translation.en: You'd rather her marry Cody.
translation.zh: 你宁愿她嫁给科迪

translation.en: As a matter of fact, he's the kind of man my baby girl deserves.
translation.zh:
实际上 他才是能配得上
我的宝贝女儿的人

translation.en: Yeah. And he's also the kind of man that's planning to take over your company.
translation.zh: 是啊 他也是计划要夺取你公司的人

translation.en: Yeah, that's right.
translation.zh: 是啊 没错

translation.en: He's bought up 47% of your shares and has a lead on another five.
translation.zh:
他已经买下了你公司47%的股份
也先你一步去购买另外那5%了

translation.en: Now, I know I'm just a substitute teacher, but...
translation.zh: 我知道我只是个代课老师 但…

translation.en: sounds to me like you're screwed.
translation.zh: 在我看来 你被他耍了

translation.en: Cody, is this true?
translation.zh: 科迪 他说的是真的吗？

translation.en: You always treated me like garbage.
translation.zh: 你总是把我当垃圾一样对待

translation.en: Worse than garbage.
translation.zh: 我甚至连垃圾都不如

translation.en: It wasn't until Megan and I broke up that you could even remember my name.
translation.zh:
我跟梅根分手前
你甚至都记不住我的名字

translation.en: I have been waiting for this moment for years.
translation.zh: 这么多年来我一直在等这一刻

translation.en: I'm sorry I can't take everything that's important to you.
translation.zh:
只是遗憾
我无法夺走对你重要的一切

translation.en: Congratulations, you two.
translation.zh: 祝你俩新婚快乐

translation.en: -Man, I ought to knock your ass out. -Hey, Benny, chill.
translation.zh:
-老天 我该狠揍你一顿
-嘿 本尼 冷静点

translation.en: -He got a mean left hook. -Oh, for real? I'm good.
translation.zh:
-他的左勾拳很厉害
-真的吗？那算了

translation.en: I'm sorry, baby girl. I've got to deal with this now.
translation.zh:
抱歉 我的宝贝女儿
我得马上去处理这事

translation.en: -No. -Mr. Swope...
translation.zh:
-不
-斯沃普先生…

translation.en: I got it. Give me a second.
translation.zh: 我来处理 等我一会儿

translation.en: Back off, Rob. This is important.
translation.zh: 让开 罗伯 这事很重要

translation.en: More important than your own daughter's wedding?
translation.zh: 比你亲生女儿的婚礼还重要？

translation.en: Look, I don't expect you to understand.
translation.zh: 听着 我不期望你能明白

translation.en: You haven't worked a real job in your life.
translation.zh: 你一生中从未干过一份真正的工作

translation.en: Here's what I do know, Mr. Swope.
translation.zh: 没错 斯沃普先生 但我懂得

translation.en: Marriage is a full-time job.
translation.zh: 婚姻就像一份全职工作

translation.en: I'm talking long hours.
translation.zh: 我说的是要投入漫长的时间

translation.en: Overtime.
translation.zh: 总是要加班

translation.en: No summers off.
translation.zh: 没有暑假

translation.en: Listen, I promise you I'm gonna give Megan everything that I have.
translation.zh:
听着 我向你承诺
我会把自己的一切都给梅根

translation.en: I'll never stop proving myself.
translation.zh: 我会永远向她证明这一点

translation.en: And I'll never ever stop loving her.
translation.zh: 我会永远、永远爱她

translation.en: I promised her mother the same thing.
translation.zh: 我向她母亲许过同样的承诺

translation.en: Oh, God, I wish she were here.
translation.zh: 老天 我真希望她在这里

translation.en: She is...
translation.zh: 她在…

translation.en: Dad.
translation.zh: 爸爸

translation.en: Okay... too soon.
translation.zh: 好吧…现在叫爸爸太早了

translation.en: Uh... What do you say we go back inside?
translation.zh: 我们返回婚礼如何？

translation.en: Come on, work can wait.
translation.zh: 来吧 工作上的事可以等等

translation.en: Megan needs her father.
translation.zh: 梅根现在需要她的父亲

translation.en: And a groom.
translation.zh: 和一个新郎

translation.en: Apparently, that's how this whole wedding thing works, right?
translation.zh:
显然婚礼仪式
就是这么规定的 不是吗？

translation.en: Rob, thank you for what you did.
translation.zh: 罗伯 谢谢你刚才的所作所为

translation.en: Cody's a liar and a cheat. I'm just glad I'm the one that caught him.
translation.zh:
科迪是个坑蒙拐骗的人
我很高兴是我拆穿了他的真面目

translation.en: I'm not talking about Cody.
translation.zh: 我说的不是科迪

translation.en: If there's any way I can possibly repay you...
translation.zh: 要是我能做些什么来回报你…

translation.en: Well...
translation.zh: 这个么…

translation.en: And now we come to the portion of the ceremony
translation.zh: 现在到了婚礼的重要环节…

translation.en: that holds great significance, the vows.
translation.zh: 新人互致结婚誓言

translation.en: I understand you two have written your own?
translation.zh: 我想你们都写好自己的婚誓了吧？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Megan, would you like to begin?
translation.zh: 梅根 你愿意先说吗？

translation.en: Actually, Father...
translation.zh: 其实 神父…

translation.en: May I?
translation.zh: 能让我先说吗？

translation.en: Megan... I know I haven't made it easy for you.
translation.zh: 梅根…我知道我给你带来了很多烦恼

translation.en: And I know I haven't been the man... that you deserve.
translation.zh:
我知道我一直都不是…
能配得上你的人

translation.en: But all the time leading up to this moment...
translation.zh: 但是在这一刻前经历的那些事…

translation.en: is exactly what I needed to put all my nonsense behind me.
translation.zh:
正是我所需要经历的
它们让我抛掉所有的荒谬想法

translation.en: Someone once said it takes 10,000 hours...
translation.zh: 有人曾说 要掌握一样技能…

translation.en: to master anything...
translation.zh: 需要花费一万个小时

translation.en: but that's a long time to keep a beautiful woman waiting.
translation.zh:
不过让一个美丽的女人
等一万个小时实在是太久了

translation.en: And, Megan, you have waited a long time.
translation.zh: 而且梅根 你已经等了…那么久

translation.en: But I promise you this:
translation.zh: 不过我向你保证

translation.en: if marriage is like playing the lottery...
translation.zh: 如果婚姻就像玩彩票

translation.en: I'm in it to win it.
translation.zh: 我会全力争取

translation.en: Oh, Rob.
translation.zh: 哦 罗伯

translation.en: I know the man that you are.
translation.zh: 我知道你的为人

translation.en: And all I need you to be is right here, right now.
translation.zh: 我需要的只是你此时此刻在我身边

translation.en: Always.
translation.zh: 永远都会在

translation.en: Megan, will you have this man to be your husband,
translation.zh:
梅根 你是否愿意接受面前的
这个男人做你的合法丈夫

translation.en: to love and to comfort,
translation.zh: 一生一世 无论健康或疾病

translation.en: to honor and to keep in sickness and in health
translation.zh: 都愿意爱他、抚慰他

translation.en: for as long as you both shall live?
translation.zh: 尊重他、守护他吗？

translation.en: I do.
translation.zh: 我愿意

translation.en: And do you, Robert?
translation.zh: 你愿意吗 罗伯特？

translation.en: Yes, I do.
translation.zh: 是的 我愿意

translation.en: Rob, the ring?
translation.zh: 罗伯特 婚戒？

translation.en: My mother's ring?
translation.zh: 我妈妈的婚戒？

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Is there anybody here who does not wish these two to be married?
translation.zh:
在座的各位有谁反对
这两位新人缔结婚姻吗？

translation.en: Let them speak now or forever hold their peace.
translation.zh: 请现在说出来或永远保持沉默

translation.en: Rob slept with a hooker!
translation.zh: 罗伯睡了一个妓女！

translation.en: It just had to come out.
translation.zh: 我必须告诉大家这个事实

translation.en: Um... I have pictures of them leaving a bar together, so it's a true story.
translation.zh:
我有他们一起离开酒吧的照片
所以这件事是真的

translation.en: Wait, what is this about, Rob?
translation.zh: 等一下 这是怎么回事 罗伯？

translation.en: I did not sleep with a hooker, okay?
translation.zh: 我没有跟妓女睡觉 好吗？

translation.en: I just brought her back, and she listened to my vows.
translation.zh:
我只是把她带回了酒店
让她听听我的结婚誓言

translation.en: -[laughs] -And actually, she was very helpful.
translation.zh: 其实 她帮了我大忙

translation.en: Oh, yeah. That sounds plausible.
translation.zh: 是嘛 听起来跟真的似的

translation.en: Unfortunately, the hooker couldn't be here to corroborate your story.
translation.zh:
不幸的是 这位妓女不可能
出现在这里 证实你的话

translation.en: Well, actually, the young lady... is right over there.
translation.zh: 其实 那位年轻的女士…就坐在那里

translation.en: Callie? Can you please tell them?
translation.zh: 凯丽？能否请你把真相告诉大家？

translation.en: -Yes, please do! -She paid me to try and sleep with him.
translation.zh:
-是啊 请告诉大家真相！
-她雇我跟他上床

translation.en: [chuckling] Okay, let's all believe a hooker.
translation.zh: 好吧 大家尽管去相信一个妓女吧

translation.en: Hello, Hooker. It's Vicky.
translation.zh: 喂 妓女 我是维姬

translation.en: Just making sure you'll be at The Glass Slipper tonight
translation.zh:
只是打电话来确定下
今晚你会出现在水晶鞋酒吧

translation.en: to do the do with Rob Anderson.
translation.zh: 和罗伯安德森做该做的事

translation.en: That is R-O-B.
translation.zh: 罗汉的罗 伯爵的伯

translation.en: Yeah, that checks out.
translation.zh: 这下穿帮了

translation.en: I want my $300 back.
translation.zh: 把我的三百美金还回来

translation.en: Wait, Vicky, why would you do this?
translation.zh: 等等 维姬 你为什么要这么做？

translation.en: Yeah, why would you do this, Vicky?
translation.zh: 是啊 维姬 你为什么要这么做？

translation.en: Wha-- he broke my heart.
translation.zh: 他伤透了我的心

translation.en: -What? -Yes.
translation.zh:
-什么？
-没错

translation.en: We had one date together, a magical night.
translation.zh:
我们约过一次会
度过了非常美妙的一晚

translation.en: And, yes, did I smell a little bit?
translation.zh: 我不就是有点体味儿？

translation.en: But I have been to a doctor since then, and it has cleared up significantly,
translation.zh:
不过那之后我就去看了医生
体味被有效地清除了

translation.en: hardly detectable.
translation.zh: 现在几乎闻不到了

translation.en: But you? You get him for the rest of your life, Miss I Smell Like Flowers?
translation.zh:
但你？花香味小姐
他要陪你共度余生？

translation.en: That is not fair.
translation.zh: 这不公平

translation.en: -Ma'am. -What?
translation.zh:
-女士
-怎么了？

translation.en: Are you aware solicitation is a felony in South Carolina?
translation.zh:
你是否知道在南卡罗来纳州
拉客属于重罪？

translation.en: Okay, don't arrest me. She's the hooker.
translation.zh: 好吧 别抓我 她才是妓女

translation.en: Yeah, but you're the one that's going down.
translation.zh: 是啊 不过进监狱的人是你

translation.en: I'm assuming you want to press charges on this one, right, Rob?
translation.zh: 我估计你想控告这个女人

translation.en: You know, I don't think so.
translation.zh: 还是算了吧

translation.en: If it wasn't for Vicky, I wouldn't be standing here right now.
translation.zh:
如果不是维姬的所做作为
我现在不会站在这里

translation.en: So I'll just chalk it up to insanity.
translation.zh:
所以我会把它当做是
她一时精神错乱

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: However, I would like you to leave.
translation.zh: 但是 我希望你离开我的婚礼

translation.en: Okay, I will see myself out.
translation.zh: 好吧 我自己出去

translation.en: I am not holding these anymore. Carpal tunnel.
translation.zh:
我不要再拿着这个了
快让我得腕管综合症了

translation.en: -Let's go. -Don't touch me.
translation.zh:
-走吧
-别碰我

translation.en: I'll take those, darling.
translation.zh: 我来拿捧花 亲爱的

translation.en: Father? Now, can we skip to the end, please?
translation.zh:
神父？我们能否
跳到最后环节 拜托？

translation.en: All right, then.
translation.zh: 好吧 那么

translation.en: I now pronounce you husband and wife!
translation.zh: 我现在宣布你们正式结为合法夫妻！

translation.en: We're married! We're married!
translation.zh: 我们结婚了！

translation.en: -We're married! -We're married!
translation.zh:
-我们结婚了！
-我们结婚了！

translation.en: I'm gonna get it, though. Hey, baby. How you doing, man?
translation.zh:
我结婚了 嘿 宝贝儿
你好吗 伙计？

translation.en: -Come on and see me, now. -I will, man.
translation.zh:
-记得回头找我玩
-我会的 兄弟

translation.en: Hey, baby.
translation.zh: 嗨 宝贝儿

translation.en: You look pretty. I like that you dressed for the occasion.
translation.zh: 你看起来好美 我喜欢你这样打扮

translation.en: Thank you for having us.
translation.zh: 谢谢你的招待

translation.en: -You must be Mrs. Right. -Yes.
translation.zh:
-你肯定是他的真命天女
-是的

translation.en: You're a vision, beautiful. That's for her.
translation.zh:
-你很有眼光 她很漂亮 就是她
-嗨

translation.en: -Nice. -Rob, who are all these people?
translation.zh:
-太好了
-罗伯 这些人是谁？

translation.en: Oh, its just a few friends I met on the way to the wedding.
translation.zh:
是我赶来参加婚礼的路上
认识的几位朋友

translation.en: And how did you get Brian McKnight to show up?
translation.zh: 你是怎么把布莱恩麦肯奈特请来的？

translation.en: You ain't gonna believe it.
translation.zh: 你不会相信的

translation.en: I actually helped him write a song. It's gonna be on the new album.
translation.zh:
其实是我帮他写了首歌
这首歌会在他的新专辑里

translation.en: -Oh, my God. -It's no big deal though, you know.
translation.zh:
-我的老天
-这没什么大不了的

translation.en: You know what? You're right. I don't believe you.
translation.zh:
你知道吗？你说得对
我不相信你说的话

translation.en: Oh, you hater.
translation.zh: 你又不在现场

translation.en: Oh, you mad 'cause Brian McKnight made me his muse.
translation.zh:
你生气是因为我给了
布莱恩麦肯奈特写歌的灵感

translation.en: You know, Rob, there is one thing you forgot to do today.
translation.zh: 罗伯 你今天还有件事忘了做

translation.en: No, I'm pretty sure I did everything, or else we wouldn't be here right now.
translation.zh:
不 我相当肯定没有漏掉什么
否则我们现在就不会站在这里

translation.en: Unh-unh. You forgot to check the numbers.
translation.zh: 你忘了看你的彩票有没有中奖

translation.en: -Ah, the numbers, right, right. -Yeah, come on.
translation.zh:
-彩票 没错
-来吧 看看中奖没

translation.en: -Okay, here we go. -All right, so did we win?
translation.zh:
-好的 我们来看看
-我们中奖了吗？

translation.en: -Yes, we most certainly did. -Yes!
translation.zh:
-是的 我们当然中奖了
-太好了！

translation.en: I just didn't pick the right numbers...
translation.zh: 我没有挑对中奖号码…

translation.en: but I picked the right girl.
translation.zh: 但我挑对了妻子

translation.en: Oh, baby. You know what? There is always next month.
translation.zh:
宝贝 你知道吗？
我们可以下个月继续买彩票

translation.en: No, I don't have time next month.
translation.zh: 不 我下个月没时间买彩票了

translation.en: You are now looking at the new full-time English lit teacher over at Larkin Prep.
translation.zh:
因为你面前的是拉金私立预科学校
新任英语文学全职教师

translation.en: -Are you serious? Really? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-你说真的？这是真的吗？
-没错

translation.en: Baby, that's amazing!
translation.zh: 宝贝 这太棒了！

translation.en: -That's amazing. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-太棒了
-是啊

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, it's my great pleasure to introduce
translation.zh: 女士们、先生们 我很荣幸地宣布

translation.en: Mr. and Mrs. Robert Anderson as they enjoy their first dance together.
translation.zh:
罗伯特安德森先生和太太
一起跳婚礼第一支舞

translation.en: Baby, are you sure you still want to do this?
translation.zh:
宝贝 你确定还想
和我跳第一支舞吗？

translation.en: It is a really important moment.
translation.zh: 这是个非常重要的时刻

translation.en: You know, it's the centerpiece to the whole reception.
translation.zh: 你知道 这可是庆祝会的精华部分

translation.en: Well, you missed a few lessons.
translation.zh: 你错过了几节舞蹈课

translation.en: And I'm really sorry about that.
translation.zh: 而我对此非常抱歉

translation.en: But I plan on making it up to you.
translation.zh: 不过我计划好如何补偿你了

translation.en: Where the hell did you learn that?
translation.zh: 你到底是从哪里学的这个？

translation.en: I found some time.
translation.zh: 我找了些时间学的

translation.en: Excuse me. This is a wedding. Why don't y'all get out here and dance?
translation.zh:
我说 这可是婚礼的庆祝会
你们大家干嘛不过来跳个舞呢？

translation.en: Come on, that's what this dance floor is for. Yeah.
translation.zh: 来吧 舞池就是为此而建的 这才对

translation.en: [Megan] What happened when you broke into the solo, though?
translation.zh: 你忽然一个人独舞起来是怎么回事？

translation.en: So did you have fun?
translation.zh: 那你开心吗？

translation.en: Oh, it was all right.
translation.zh: 还行吧

translation.en: All right?
translation.zh: 还行？

translation.en: We got married, Brian McKnight sang your favorite song.
translation.zh:
我们结婚了
布莱恩麦肯奈特唱了你最爱的歌

translation.en: -That was incredible. -What more do you want?
translation.zh:
-这太不可思议了
-你还想要什么？

translation.en: Uh, well, you know. When we get to the room, I can show you.
translation.zh:
等我们回到房间
我可以让你看我还想要什么

translation.en: You have no idea how long I've been waiting to hear that.
translation.zh: 你不知道我为了听到这句话等了多久

translation.en: Mm, come on.
translation.zh: 走吧

translation.en: You know, let's just take the stairs.
translation.zh: 我们还是走楼梯吧

translation.en: -You sure? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-你确定？
-是的

translation.en: Oh, you gonna try to cheat? Oh!
translation.zh: 你想赢我还早着呢！
